I gave TÜBİTAK awards to Turkish scientists who have signed international success.
In particular, students and young people should familiarize themselves with these distinguished scientists who are known worldly ...
... and I share these photos with you because I want them to take the example.
Professor in the field of engineering sciences. Özlem Keskin Özkaya is doing cell studies about the treatment of cancer.
He attracted attention with his work in the most famous universities and research centers of the world.
In this photo, the daughter of the beautiful child Ozlem who holds the award. http://t.co/eioep68 to

The adoption of the new Egyptian constitution means, with the utmost clarity and determination, the end of a transitional period that has been too long
It is time for work and production to advance our beloved country
Egypt, the state and the society, have kept it a new era in which there can be no tyranny, injustice, discrimination or lack of social justice
All citizens of all social classes, beliefs and political positions are equal before the law and under this Constitution

Egypt will not build some of its sons without others, Egypt for all Egyptians and freedom for all people without exception and democracy is the fruit of everyone's effort after the success of the revolution
The building of a modern state after many years of tyranny, corruption, dictatorship and absolute power can only be done with the solidarity of all the forces of society
We seek a deeper application of an institutionalized judgment based on accountability for every sinner or omnipotent and works decisively to combat corruption in all its forms and practices
Modern modern democratic states can not be established without strict mechanisms to extend the rule of law # President
I emphasize the strengthening of the power of the judiciary and ensuring its independence
